scenarios.name: Check display order of newly created habit
scenarios.description: After creating a new habit, the user returns to the main page to verify its position in the habit list.

scenarios.name: Complete an unfinished habit
scenarios.description: On the main page, the user marks an unfinished habit as completed by clicking the question mark icon.

extra-info.Input Data: Habit name: Drink eight glasses of water every day; Initial state: unfinished; Final state: completed

scenarios.name: Search habit from home page
scenarios.description: Verify that searching for an existing habit name returns correct results.

scenarios.name: Create a positive habit and verify color indicator
scenarios.description: The user creates a positive habit, such as drinking water daily, selects a frequency of three times per week, sets a reminder at 6:00 AM, and saves the habit.

extra-info.Input Data: Drink water; Frequency: three times per week; Reminder time: 6:00 AM

scenarios.name: Search archived habit
scenarios.description: The user searches for an archived habit named "Playing football" and verifies that it is correctly displayed.

scenarios.name: Move saved city list
scenarios.description: The user moves '上海' to the first of the list by drag it up in manage locations page

scenarios.name: View city weather
scenarios.description: On the main page, the user views the weather forecast for different saved cities.

scenarios.name: Rename a city
scenarios.description: The user renames a saved city by opening the rename dialog and entering a new city name.

extra-info.Input Data: Original city: Paris; New city: Seattle

scenarios.name: View weather forecast after three days
scenarios.description: The user views the weather forecast for Seattle three days later from the main page.

scenarios.name: View local rainfall information
scenarios.description: The user checks current rainfall conditions and the rainfall forecast for the next ten minutes.

scenarios.name: View weather forecast after twelve days
scenarios.description: The user views the twelve-day weather forecast for saved cities.

scenarios.name: Import previously configured cities
scenarios.description: The user imports a previously backed-up city configuration file from the settings page.

scenarios.name: Search products by keyword
scenarios.description: The user enters a product keyword in the Taobao search bar and the system returns a list of relevant products.

scenarios.name: View basic product details
scenarios.description: The user opens a product detail page to view its title, price, main image, and delivery information.

scenarios.name: Browse product reviews
scenarios.description: The user browses other buyers’ reviews and images on the product detail page and opens review images.

scenarios.name: Add product to shopping cart
scenarios.description: The user clicks the "Add to Cart" button on the product detail page to add the product to the cart.

scenarios.name: Purchase a T-shirt
scenarios.description: The user searches for T-shirts, selects the best-selling product, configures personal information, and waits for order confirmation.

scenarios.name: Filter products using multiple conditions
scenarios.description: The user filters products by combining price range and high sales volume conditions.

scenarios.name: Search hotels and view list
scenarios.description: The user enters "San Francisco" in the hotel search box and the system returns a list of hotels in that city.

scenarios.name: Search travel attractions and guides
scenarios.description: The user searches for must-visit attractions and travel guides for Seattle.

scenarios.name: View hotel detail information
scenarios.description: The user opens a hotel detail page to view room types, prices, user ratings, and reviews.

scenarios.name: Book a train ticket
scenarios.description: The user searches for available train services from Nanjing to Beijing and completes a ticket booking.

scenarios.name: Book a flight and complete online payment
scenarios.description: The user searches for a flight, fills in passenger information, and completes the booking with online payment.

scenarios.name: Post a community note
scenarios.description: The user posts a note with photos and text content.

scenarios.name: Search and play a song
scenarios.description: The user searches for a song named "Yellow" and attempts to play it.

scenarios.name: Set default playback quality to high
scenarios.description: The user sets the default playback audio quality to high in the settings.

scenarios.name: Identify a song by listening
scenarios.description: The user activates the song recognition feature to identify a song through microphone input.

scenarios.name: Activate humming recognition
scenarios.description: The user activates the humming recognition feature from the QQ Music home page.

scenarios.name: Search music by artist name
scenarios.description: The user searches for music by entering an artist name.

scenarios.name: Post a comment
scenarios.description: The user posts a comment on the song detail page.
